doc:
James Mason (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Mason_(American_actor) 0 James Pier Mason (February 3, 1889 – November 7, 1959) was an American actor. He appeared in 173 films between 1914 and 1952, often as a villain or henchman in Westerns, and was sometimes credited as James Mason or Jim Mason. He's memorable as the drug-addicted criminal who shoots Lon Chaney's character Blizzard in the final moments of 1920's The Penalty. James_Pier_Mason ( February_3_,_1889 – November_7_,_1959 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in 173_films between 1914_and_1952 , often as a_villain_or_henchman in Westerns , and was_sometimes_credited as James_Mason_or_Jim_Mason . He 's memorable as the_drug-addicted_criminal who shoots Lon_Chaney 's_character_Blizzard in the_final_moments of 1920 's_The_Penalty .
